mapper.select: select staff_seq, staff_name, staff_role, staff_image, staff_phone, staff_intro, staff_nickname, shop_seq from T_STAFF
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_STAFF (staff_name, staff_role, staff_image, staff_phone, staff_intro, staff_nickname, shop_seq) VALUES (#{staff_name},#{staff_role},#{staff_image},#{staff_phone},#{staff_intro},#{staff_nickname},#{shop_seq})
INSERT INTO T_TEMPDAY (shop_seq, staff_seq, temp_offday) VALUES (#{shop_seq}, (SELECT staff_seq FROM T_STAFF WHERE staff_name = '찾고자하는 직원의 이름'), #{temp_offday})
